item.description:
http://www.thewadsworth.org/event/first-thursdays/  -the event

Atheneum is partnering with Cirque du Soleil to create a spectacular fantasy evening at Art After Hours! This event will take place outside on Atheneum Square North (weather permitting). $10 admission, Free for members & employees of Travelers. CIRQUE ON THE PLAZA Fun in the sun on Travelers Plaza - Enjoy the amazing feats of street performers - Be dazzled by costumes created by Anne Cubberly - Live music by the XY Eli Band - Body art by AMAZING FACE ART - Make a mark during chalk-drawing - Win tickets or discounted admission to QUIDAMFILM: Desert Flower, 8 PM Evolution – Celebrate the culmination of the Neighborhood Studios Summer Youth Program and enjoy the apprentices’ photography exhibition Food for purchase by various food vendors. Cash bar.

http://www.xyeli.com/  - the band

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TCpXLQTQepo&feature=share  the movie

Desert Flower - A Somali shepherd’s daughter becomes a top supermodel in this beautifully shot biopic. 2010. UK. 124 min. Directed by Sherry Hormann
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the plaza.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Art After Hours! CIRQUE ON THE PLAZA (Movie@8pm- "Desert Flower")
